---
category: news
title: "GPT-4 Vision: A breakthrough in image deciphering unveils potential for 'prompt injection attacks'"
excerpt: "GPT-4 Vision is a new part of GPT-4 multi-modal functionality that inspects and reads images. Prompt injection allows threat actors to place malicious code or instructions in an image to execute code or exfiltrate data. There have been successful proof-of-concept attacks performed through GPT-4 Vision."
publishedDateTime: 2023-10-18T20:22:00Z
